name: Jasmine Chen
title: Staff Software Engineer
intro: A dedicated Staff Software Engineer at Google with over 10 years of experience in building scalable, high-performance web applications using React and modern system architecture. I specialize in career growth, interview preparation, and navigating the transition to senior engineering roles. Let's map your success story.

professionalExperience.title: Staff Software Engineer
professionalExperience.description: Led a team of 5 engineers in redesigning the core user authentication flow, resulting in a 15% latency reduction and 99.99% uptime.

professionalExperience.title: Senior Software Engineer
professionalExperience.description: Developed features for the desktop application, improving user engagement metrics by 20% over two years.

sessions.name: 30 min General Q&A
sessions.description: Quick advice, roadmap checks, or simple technical questions.

sessions.name: 60 min Interview Prep (Technical)
sessions.description: Focused mock interviews, system design walkthroughs, and detailed feedback.

reviews.text: Jasmine's system design breakdown was crystal clear. Highly recommend for FAANG interview prep!
Extremely valuable career advice. She helped me negotiate a 15% higher salary.
Great session, though I wish we had more time to cover my resume fully.
